title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, designed with simplicity in mind. This easy-to-use dehydrator is perfect for our beloved elderly folks who may be easily confused. 

Designed in California, this dehydrator boasts a powerful 600W motor, providing efficient and reliable performance. With a maximum temperature of 165°F / 73°C, you can confidently dry your favorite jerky to perfection. 

The hot air circulation from the rear fan ensures even drying throughout the six stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, offering a generous drying space of 6.48ft². Worried about forgetting to turn it off? Don't be! The digital control panel features a convenient timer that can be set for up to 48 hours, allowing you to relax and let the dehydrator do its magic. 

Cleaning up is a breeze with dishwasher-safe trays, saving you time and effort. Plus, the dehydrator operates at less than 48dB, ensuring a quiet and peaceful environment. 

Safety is a top priority with the COSORI Food Dehydrator. It features an auto-shutoff function and overheat protection, giving you peace of mind while using the appliance. 

Compatible with 120V in both USA and Canada, this dehydrator comes with a glass door and a touch-control LED display, making it easy to monitor and adjust settings. The memory function allows you to save your preferred settings for future use. 

Not only does this dehydrator extend the shelf life of your favorite snacks, but it also comes with 50 included recipes to inspire your culinary adventures. Additionally, it includes extra accessories such as a mesh screen and fruit roll sheet, perfect for creating a variety of tasty treats. 

Upgrade your snacking experience with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, the perfect companion for elderly folks who appreciate simplicity and convenience.

The temperature control ranges from 95° to 165°F, allowing you to customize the drying process to your liking. The included timer can be set for up to 48 hours, ensuring that your snacks are perfectly dehydrated every time.

Safety is a top priority, and this dehydrator has you covered. It features an auto shutoff function and overheat protection, giving you peace of mind while you go about your day. The quiet operation, with a noise level of less than 48dB, ensures that you can enjoy your snacks without any disturbances.

The glass door allows you to monitor the drying process without opening the dehydrator, keeping the temperature consistent. The memory function remembers your last settings, making it even easier to use. Plus, it extends the shelf life of your homemade snacks, so you can enjoy them for longer.

As a bonus, we've included 50 delicious recipes to inspire your culinary adventures. And with additional accessories like a mesh screen and fruit roll sheet, you can get creative with your snacks.
